an7.84:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these seven principles for the settlement of any disciplinary issues that might arise.
an7.84:1.3: Resolution face-to-face to be applied. Resolution through recollection to be granted. Resolution because of past insanity to be granted. Acting according to what has been admitted. Majority decision. Further penalty. Covering over as if with grass.
an7.84:1.4: These are the seven principles for the settlement of any disciplinary issues that might arise.”
